title: text_search_parser
content: # `prefect.server.utilities.text_search_parser` Text search query parser Parses text search queries according to the following syntax: * Space-separated terms → OR logic (include) * Prefix with `-` or `!` → Exclude term * Prefix with `+` → Required term (AND logic, future) * Quote phrases → Match exact phrase * Backslash escapes → Allow quotes within phrases (") * Case-insensitive, substring matching * 200 character limit ## Functions ### `parse_text_search_query` ```python theme={null} parse_text_search_query(query: str) -> TextSearchQuery ``` Parse a text search query string into structured components **Args:** * `query`: The query string to parse **Returns:** * TextSearchQuery with parsed include/exclude/required terms ## Classes ### `TextSearchQuery` Parsed text search query structure
